      • returnBuffer

        public char[][] returnBuffer()
        Returns:
        Reference to the buffer array

      • syncBuffer

        public void syncBuffer(char[][] in)

        Overwrite the contents of the buffer with the contents of another 2d array of equal size

        Parameters:
        in - 2Dimensional array of equal size to buffer to be copied into buffer
        Throws:
        java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException - If the 'in' array is smaller than buffer

        Fills the buffer with space characters

        Fills a supplied array with one character

        Parameters:
        array - 2Dimensional array to be filled with the fill character
        fill - Character to fill array with

      • getCharacter

        public char getCharacter(int y,
                         int x)
        Parameters:
        y - y Coordinate to retreive from buffer
        x - x Coordinate to retreive from buffer
        Returns:
        Character at a specified coordinate y x

      • writeCharacter

        public void writeCharacter(int y,
                           int x,
                           char character)

        Write a supplied character to specified coordinate in buffer

        Parameters:
        y - y Coordinate to write at
        x - x Coordinate to write at
        character - Character to be written at y x

      • writeArea

        public void writeArea(int y,
                      int x,
                      char[][] area,
                      int mode)

        Write the contents of a provided 2d array into an area starting from y x into the buffer

        Parameters:
        y - y Coordinate to write supplied array from
        x - x Coordinate to write supplied array from
        area - 2Dimensional array to be written into area starting at y x in buffer
        mode - Determines whether to write area with/without space character as 0/1 respectively.
